title: endu mama
sahitya:
endu mama sadanattilinnu vannu ramaNa


anupallavi

  hanta mArgam marannitO centArshara samAkAra


caraNam 1    taruNa mayi pUrva mirunna rAgam kuranjyadhunA para kAmini mAril kramENa viravil vaLarnnayyO aramahaha mAmaka nAma karNana matam tava virasa tama mennu tava karuNA jnyAnarinjyE nahO
    caraNam 2    cirakAlam kUDi jnyAninnu shrI padmanAbha ninnE paricinODiha kanDEn bhAgya vashattinAl 
aruNa kisalayadhara paravasha yAkummAm ananya sharaNayenniha karuti sarasa ramaya vaikAtE
